translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

For the good of the mission to the Court of Rio de Janeiro, of which I am in charge by the Legislative Assembly of this Province, I request from Your Excellency José de Araújo Ribeiro addressed to Bento Manuel Ribeiro on the 27th of last month, intercepted by the Most Excellent Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Doctor Américo Cabral de Melo Domingos José de Almeida Member of the Deputation to Rio de Janeiro. Porto Alegre, March 7, 1836.
